review_content: My Beagle, Ace, has had 2 back surgeries for ruptured discs. He has had such a hard time. I've been researching (which is to say I've done a lot of reading and looking) CBD's and finally decided to try these from Medterra. Honestly, because they dont look shady. The site is easily navigable, they dont appear to be trying to hide anything (i.e privacy policy..research results/lab testing...etc). And the reviews from customers. Anyway so day 4, I wouldnt say "hes a new dog" but today he ran around the couch a few times like a crackhead. Everytime I went out to smoke he was right behind me. His ears perk up everytime he lifts his head and.. most importantly, he doesnt look sad. There is most certainly a noticable difference.  I am in a Beagle group on Facebook in which I have been putting together a pinned "trusted CBD" page (info and experience from longstanding, trusted members) and Medterra will most certainly be on it. Personally I will be a customer here as long as my boys are with me.  I had one small issue, a mix up on shipping. I chose priority mail and some how that got over looked. I chatted with customer service and was told "we will be refunding you the shipping cost".. I havent even looked yet to see if they have. With all that's going on in the world today and not knowing who's open for business or when, 8bux for shipping is the last thing I'm worried about.  I'm happy with the results so far and I would (and will) recommend Medterra to anyone/everyone.  Thank you

review_title: We love the calming pet chews
review_content: We recently rescued two 6 week old puppies. They are great dogs, but they are young and we are old. They have lots and lots of energy to be contained. Sometimes they even get over-tired and start going completely crazy.   We exercise and walk them appropriately, but sometimes they need to be settled down. The Medterra calming chews work great for them. We give them the correct dosage and then get them to sit with us for about 20 minutes and ... poof, they are off to dreamland.   When it's time for a vet visit, we give them a half-dosage and they are so much more calm - and the boy puppy is quite the dramatist, so we love having these chews on hand.  I just started selling these chews in my store and have several regular customers already. They are the best!

review_title: Worked well but efficacy tapered off
review_content: I purchased this product for use on my lower back.  When I first started using this product, probably for the first 3-5 weeks of Daily or e/o day use, it worked incredibly!  The cooling is intense and provides instant soothing. The smell is strong but I like it; menthol and other herbs. I was really happy with this.  After the first several weeks I have noticed that I feel absolutely no cooling effects at all anymore when used on my back, as if the skin here has developed a tolerance to the cooling. I do still get the cooling effect when applied to other areas not previously exposed to the cream, so I don‚Äôt believe the product has been compromised in any way.  But I‚Äôm pretty disappointed to not feel the cooling anymore, as this was the most intense part.  I‚Äôll admit it seems less effective without the cooling.  I am going to refrain from use on my back for a couple weeks to see if the cooling effect returns.

review_title: Been using this for several years
review_content: Ive been using this product for several years with great success. It is a great product offered by a reputable company. I have recommended it to several people who now use this brand and are very happy with the results. I do have a suggestion. In this era of trying to reduce waste and having an environmental problem with disposal of plastic I suggest MEDterra look into reducing the size of the bottles they use for their products. NOT the amount of capsules but smaller bottles. The other day I looked at all the bottles taking up room in my cabinet and decided to consolidate. I put the contents of 3 bottles of 30 gel capsules into one of their regular bottles that contained the original 30. I know the psychology of having larger containers for products but anyone who comes home from shopping opens their purchases for use and then looks into their trash basket knows how much waste is caused by manufacturers using over sized packaging. Smaller bottles would be a great savings for the company take up less space for those of us who buy in quantity and be a step forward to reducing waste for which we have to pay disposal fees.

Went on a road trip to Texas recently and was driving for 12 hours at a time which can make anyone's mind drift. A friend of mine gave me these Stay Alert gummies for the trip and they kept me completely focused the entire trip. Great taste and worked better than I expected to be honest. I thought it would be like one of those 5 hour energy shot scams you find at gas stations but it was nothing like it. Energy drinks give me intense migraines and make me crash in 2-3 hours but these gummies had none of those side effects. No jitters whatsoever. Might take these for work as well now!
The caffeine in coffee tends to be a little to much for me and these hit the spot! Side note, they are delicious!

review_title: Was curious... Glad I tried them
review_content: I received an email from Medterra that they were going to be releasing gummies. I was curious about the gummies for sleep. Decided to give them a try and placed an order. The first night I tried them it was difficult to tell whether there was a difference in sleep. I continued taking them each night and by the third night I noticed a difference that I was relaxed and could initiate the act of actually falling asleep easier. I tend to wake up during the night due to back pain and noticed that while I still do move around in bed I'm able to fall back asleep easier with these. Overall I'm glad that I tried these and will continue ordering them. On nights I'm really wanting to ensure I'm getting a good sleep I'll use the Medterra tincture in combination with gummy to ensure I sleep well.
